articles.title: Constellation to Acquire Calpine; Creates America’s Leading Producer of Clean and Reliable Energy to Meet Growing Demand for Customers and Communities - Constellation Energy
articles.description: Constellation (Nasdaq: CEG) and Calpine Corp. today announced they have entered into a definitive agreement under which Constellation will acquire Calpine in a cash and stock transaction valued at an equity purchase price of approximately $16.4 billion, compo…
articles.content: BALTIMORE and HOUSTON (Jan. 10, 2025) Constellation (Nasdaq: CEG) and Calpine Corp. today announced they have entered into a definitive agreement under which Constellation will acquire Calpine in a c… [+11100 chars]

articles.author: WILL WEISSERT, AMELIA THOMSON-DEVEAUX
articles.title: Americans have dimmer view of Biden than they did of Trump or Obama as term ends, AP-NORC poll finds - The Associated Press
articles.description: Americans have a dimmer view of Joe Biden’s presidency as he prepares to leave office than they did at the end of Donald Trump’s first term or Barack Obama’s second. A new poll finds around one-quarter of U.S. adults say Biden was a “good” or “great” presiden…
articles.content:
WASHINGTON (AP) As Joe Biden prepares to leave office, Americans have a dimmer view of his presidency than they did at the end of Donald Trumps first term or Barack Obamas second, a new poll finds.
